attributes.action: allow people to sign petitions on this site in disagreement with the subject
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Simply having a number of people in agreement with a subject is totally meaningless unless you see how many people disagree aswell.
 As they are useless it shows they won't be listened to, apart select results that suit to back up an opinion, giving credence to unwanted or absurd policy.
 A counter petition will rarely be exactly opposite and without being linked to the one it is countering then it is of little use either.

rejection.details: This issue is addressed in the site FAQs http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
